title: runtime test times out during build on GNU/Linux on ARMv6
body:
by **ahferroin7**: 
Attempting to build go from source cloned from the mercurial repository.
Building on Debian GNU/Linux on a 700Mhz ARMv6 processor (specifically, a Broadcom
BCM2835 SoC).
The actual build appears to complete fine.
While running the tests however, multiple tests (those for the runtime and math/rand)
overrun the allotted execution time.
I don't know if this is just due to the limited processing speed, or due to some other
problem.
